name: Memory of Dust
desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

values.desc: Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>4%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>25%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>5%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>6%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>35%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>7%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Increases Shield Strength by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
